prodNameC: “恩奈格斯特”單純皰疹病毒IgM抗體 檢驗試劑
ingredientsDesc:
Enzygnost Anti-HSV/lgM Test Plate: with deactivated HSV antigen-coated microtitration plate.The left row of a strip contains antigen from HSV-infected permanent monkey kidney cells, and the right row contains antigen from uninfected cells (= control antigen).

Anti-Human-IgM/POD Conjugate: Goat antibodies to human IgM, conjugated with peroxidase in
0.05 mol/L Tris/HCl Buffer Solution, pH 7.2, with polygeline 0.5 %. The conjugate is red colored.
Dye: approximately 400 mg/L Brilliant Ponceau.
Preservative: maximum 1 g/L phenol.

Conjugate Buffer Microbiol: 37 mg/L EDTA in 0.01 molar phosphate buffer solution, pH 7.2,with Tetronic, approximately 2 %, BSA approxirnately 1 %.
Preservatives: approximately 100 mg/L gentamicin,
approximately 6 mg/L 5-chloro-2-methyl-isothiazole-3-one,
and approximately 2 mg/L 2-methyl-4-isothiazole-3-one.

Anti-HSV Reference P/P: Human serum with IgG-antibodies to HSV-antigens in conjunction with
rheumatoid factors (RF) in Tris buffer solution (20 mmol/L, pH 7.4, with Humanalbin (5 %), approximately 60 %.
The nominal value required for the evaluation as well as its upper and lower margins in absorbance units are listed in the barcode table of values.
Preservatives: approximately 5 mg/L amphotericin B and approximately 100 mg/L gentamicin.

Anti-HSV Reference P/N: Human serum with IgG-antibodies to HSV antigens in Tris buffer solution (20 mmol/L), pH 7.4, with Humanalbin (5 %), approximately 60 %.
Preservatives: approximately 5 mg/L amphotericin B and approximately 100 mg/L gentamicin.

Sample Buffer POD: 0.3 mol/L Tris/HCl buffer solution, pH 8.0 - 8.2, with Tween 20 approximately 0.1 %, polygeline approximately 1 %, bovine serum approximately 5 %.
Preservatives: approxirnately 5 mg/L amphotericin B and approximately 100 mg/L gentamicin.

RF-Absorbent (lyophilized): Sheep antibodies targeted against human IgG-Fc fragment in phosphate buffered (10 mmol/L.) , p.H 7.2, saline solution (8.2 g/L).
Preservative: Sodium azide (maximum 0.4 g/L).
applicantName: 西門子醫療設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市南港區園區街3號2樓之2
efficacy: 定性及定量檢測人類血清與血漿中單純皰疹病毒(HSV)之特異性IgM抗體的酵素免疫分析法。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3305 單純皰疹病毒血清試劑
